results.title: Review of the Case Reports on Metformin, Sulfonylurea, and Thiazolidinedione Therapies in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients
results.text_hl: In some @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may affect sleep quality and, in rare cases, leads to the occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@; thus, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ taking this drug should be monitored for their kidney status, plasma pH, and plasma @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ level.

citations.NLM: Susilawati E, Levita J, Susilawati Y, Sumiwi SA. Review of the Case Reports on Metformin, Sulfonylurea, and Thiazolidinedione Therapies in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients Med Sci (Basel). 2023 Aug 15;11(3):. PMID: 37606429
citations.BibTeX: @article{37606429, title={Review of the Case Reports on Metformin, Sulfonylurea, and Thiazolidinedione Therapies in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients}, author={Susilawati E and Levita J and Susilawati Y and Sumiwi SA}, journal={Med Sci (Basel)}, volume={11}, number={3}}

results.title: Dietary Folate Deficiency Promotes Lactate Metabolic Disorders to Sensitize Lung Cancer Metastasis through MTOR-Signaling-Mediated Druggable Oncotargets
results.text_hl: Pre-treatment of the FD-LCS-implanted @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with the mTORC1 inhibitor, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@, and the anti-metabolic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ abolished FD/LCS-activated mTORC1 and its targets including @GENE_HIF1A @GENE_15251 @@@HIF1alpha@@@, @GENE_HK2 @GENE_15277 @@@HK2@@@, LDH, and monocarboxylate transporters (@GENE_MCT1 @GENE_17236 @@@MCT1@@@ and @GENE_SLC16A3 @GENE_80879 @@@MCT4@@@), which coincided with the reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate@@@ disorders and prevention of @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@LC metastasis@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen WJ, Huang SY, Chen YW, Liu YF, Huang RS. Dietary Folate Deficiency Promotes Lactate Metabolic Disorders to Sensitize Lung Cancer Metastasis through MTOR-Signaling-Mediated Druggable Oncotargets Nutrients. 2023 Mar 21;15(6):. PMID: 36986244
citations.BibTeX: @article{36986244, title={Dietary Folate Deficiency Promotes Lactate Metabolic Disorders to Sensitize Lung Cancer Metastasis through MTOR-Signaling-Mediated Druggable Oncotargets}, author={Chen WJ and Huang SY and Chen YW and Liu YF and Huang RS}, journal={Nutrients}, volume={15}, number={6}}

results.title: Case Report: Late-Onset Mitochondrial Disease Uncovered by Metformin Use in a Patient With Acute Verbal Auditory Agnosia
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Alexia_Pure @DISEASE_MESH:D020237 @@@Verbal auditory agnosia@@@ is rarely caused by @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_encephalopathy @DISEASE_MESH:C538525 @@@mitochondrial encephalopathy@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, and @DISEASE_MELAS_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D017241 @@@stroke-like episodes (MELAS) syndrome@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@Lactate acidosis@@@, which is the adverse effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, has proposed links to @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ and may trigger clinical features of @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin WH, Yang IH, Cheng HE, Lin HF. Case Report: Late-Onset Mitochondrial Disease Uncovered by Metformin Use in a Patient With Acute Verbal Auditory Agnosia Front Neurol. 2022;13():863047. PMID: 35401420
citations.BibTeX: @article{35401420, title={Case Report: Late-Onset Mitochondrial Disease Uncovered by Metformin Use in a Patient With Acute Verbal Auditory Agnosia}, author={Lin WH and Yang IH and Cheng HE and Lin HF}, journal={Front Neurol}, volume={13}, pages={863047}}

results.title: [Metformin and kidneys].
results.text_hl: The greatest risk of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment is @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@, but its incidence is very low if the contraindications are observed.

citations.NLM: Smahelová A. [Metformin and kidneys]. Vnitr Lek. 2008 May;54(5):535-40. PMID: 18630642
citations.BibTeX: @article{18630642, title={[Metformin and kidneys].}, author={Smahelová A}, journal={Vnitr Lek}, volume={54}, number={5}, pages={535-40}}

results.title: [Lactic acidosis associated with metformin].
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@Lactic acidosis@@@ is an extremely rare but serious complication of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. In order to avoid @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@, it is important to select @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ correctly and to ensure that contraindications such as cases of @DISEASE_Hypomagnesemia_5_Renal_with_Ocular_Involvement @DISEASE_MESH:C565423 @@@renal involvement@@@, advanced age and @DISEASE_Hepatitis_Alcoholic @DISEASE_MESH:D006519 @@@chronic alcoholism@@@ are observed prior to treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Lebech M, Olesen LL. [Lactic acidosis associated with metformin]. Ugeskr Laeger. 1990 Aug 27;152(35):2511-2. PMID: 2402835
citations.BibTeX: @article{2402835, title={[Lactic acidosis associated with metformin].}, author={Lebech M and Olesen LL}, journal={Ugeskr Laeger}, volume={152}, number={35}, pages={2511-2}}

results.title: [Lactic acidosis induced by excessive ingestion of metformin].
results.text_hl: The authors report on a case of lethal @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@ during acute @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_barbituric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032232 @@@barbiturate@@@ @DISEASE_Poisoning @DISEASE_MESH:D011041 @@@poisoning@@@.

citations.NLM: Bismuth C, Gaultier M, Conso F, Assan R, Heuclin C. [Lactic acidosis induced by excessive ingestion of metformin]. Eur J Toxicol Environ Hyg. 1976 Jan-Feb;9(1):55-7. PMID: 1253831

results.title: Metformin after bariatric surgery--an acid problem.
results.text_hl: Therefore a large number of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing bariatric surgery will be on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment. However, use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been associated with @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Aberle J, Reining F, Dannheim V, Flitsch J, Klinge A, Mann O. Metformin after bariatric surgery--an acid problem. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2012 Mar;120(3):152-3. PMID: 21915819

results.title: Hemodialysis-refractory metformin-associated lactate acidosis with hypoglycemia, hypothermia, and bradycardia in a diabetic patient with belated diagnosis and chronic kidney disease : .
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-associated @<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@MALA@@@) is a well-known, life-threatening, but rare side effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Zibar L, Zibar K. Hemodialysis-refractory metformin-associated lactate acidosis with hypoglycemia, hypothermia, and bradycardia in a diabetic patient with belated diagnosis and chronic kidney disease : . Int J Clin Pharmacol Ther. 2017 Apr;55(4):348-351. PMID: 28139970
